definition: to pay/to hand over to/classifier for pairs or sets of things

pinyin: dui4 fang1 fu4 fei4 dian4 hua4
dian3 ji1 fu4 fei4 guang3 gao4

sentences.chinese: 莎士比亞的“付費圍牆”跟隨他走四方。

sentences.english: People will pay for access to those in a way they won't for the latest episode of House or a reality show.
sentences.chinese: 人們付費來閱覽的並非是一段議會的插曲或現實秀。

sentences.english: This may or may not be linked with other pay for play models.
sentences.chinese: 這種方法可以，也可以不與其他付費遊戲模式相聯。
考慮預付費的銀行借記卡。

sentences.english: A lot of motels lie beside the turnpike.
sentences.chinese: 很多汽車旅館都位於付費公路旁邊。

sentences.english: P4P focuses on both quality issues and patient satisfaction.
sentences.chinese: 按效付費關注質量和患者滿意度兩方面。

sentences.english: What kind of an asshole would call collect?
sentences.chinese: 什麼傻瓜才接對方付費的長途電話？

sentences.english: We have a collect call for Mr. Wang from Mr. Chen.
sentences.chinese: 我們有一通陳先生打給王先生的受話人付費電話。

sentences.english: Operator,I'd like to make a collet call,please.
sentences.chinese: 接線員，我要打對方付費的電話。

sentences.english: Very few people pay to play.
sentences.chinese: 很少的人會付費來遊戲。

sentences.english: But when you’re shopping at a charity store, pay the sticker price.
sentences.chinese: 但是如果在慈善店裏買東西的話，按標價付費吧。

sentences.english: It is also a licensed product, which means it costs money.
sentences.chinese: 它還是一項許可的產品，這意味着它需要付費。

sentences.english: You have to pay for a company to verify who you are and to issue a certificate.
sentences.chinese: 您必須向公司支付費用來校驗和發佈證書。

sentences.english: Most wall-building is being done by small local outfits.
sentences.chinese: 大多數付費系統是小型地方單位經營的。

sentences.english: I'd like to make an overseas collect call.
sentences.chinese: 我要打對方付費的越洋電話。

sentences.english: They also offer built-in motion detection and 16-camera premium software.
sentences.chinese: 它們還內置移動監測和16倍變焦鏡頭付費軟件。

definition: to go online/to connect to the Internet/(of a document etc) to be uploaded to the Internet/(tennis, volleyball etc) to move in close to the net
to pay the bill/to settle accounts/also written 結賬|结账
